entries.title: TikTok Wins a Vote in South Dakota
entries.description: The Rapid City council voted, 8-1, against a proposed municipal ban of the Chinese-owned app.

entries.title: Stellantis to Build Flying Taxis With Archer Aviation
entries.description: The global auto maker plans to help Archer build its first electric aircraft at a factory in Georgia.

entries.title: Meta Fined More Than $400 Million for Sending Online Activity-Based Ads
entries.description: European regulators ruled the Facebook and Instagram parent can’t use its contracts with users to justify sending them ads based on their online activity, a blow to the digital-advertising industry.

entries.title: Salesforce to Lay Off 10% of Workforce, Reduce Offices
entries.description: The business-software provider said it will incur about $1.4 billion to $2.1 billion in charges with the move.

entries.title: India's Face-Off With Big Tech Will Intensify in 2023
entries.description: U.S. tech firms will face hard choices in India this year as New Delhi continues to clamp down on big firms while expanding government control over the internet.

entries.title: Twitter Says It Plans to Expand Political Ads Allowed on Platform
entries.description: Political advertising was largely banned in 2019 under then-Chief Executive Jack Dorsey.
